thread.title: Marion Le Pen SLAMS EU for bringing terrorism and unemployment into France
thread.title_full: Marion Le Pen SLAMS EU for bringing terrorism and unemployment into France

title: Marion Le Pen SLAMS EU for bringing terrorism and unemployment into France
text:
Marion Le Pen SLAMS EU for bringing terrorism and unemployment into France Marion Le Pen SLAMS EU for bringing terrorism and unemployment into France MEMBER of parliament for the Front National (FN) Marion Le Pen, has blamed the European Union (EU) for unemployment and terrorism in France. PUBLISHED: 21:34,  04,   Marion has blasted the EU for France's terrorism and unemployment 
In a tweet, the Front National MP, Marion Le Pen said: “The European Union has also brought unemployment, insecurity and terrorism. #LeGrandJury.” 
The MP made the comments in response to Le Grand Jury, which is a French political broadcast of RTL taking place on Sundays. 
She was invited as a guest on the French show on Sunday. GETTY Marine Le Pen is riding high in the polls week before the election Marion Le Pen in pictures Wed, July 27, 2016 The niece of French far-right leader Marine Le Pen has joined the military reserve and has urged "young patriots" to follow in her footsteps, take a look through her career to date, AFP/Getty Images 1 of 12 French far right Front National (National Front - FN) party's Parliament member and candidate for the regional elections in the Provence-Alpes-Cote d'Azur (PACA) Related articles
